pathAssistantSteps.info:
In case of New Client

  1. Go to the ‘Client’ Tab & finish creating the client
  2. Enquiry, Client & Contact will be visible in WCGT360 after DS Approval.

In case of Existing Client

  1. Go to the WCGT 360 platform to create the pipeline.
  2. Enquiry will be visible in WCGT360 after conversion.

Business-As-Usual

1. Reach out & have a discussion about the opportunity with the relevant BUEL

2. Capture & record “Next Steps and Recommendations from BUEL”

3. Update Expertise/Enquiry Type, if required

4. Mark Stage as Complete & Convert the Enquiry

Strategic

5. Have a discussion about the opportunity with the Solution Council

6. Capture & record “Next Steps and Recommendations from Solution Council; and Save

7. Update Expertise/Enquiry Type, if required

8. Mark Stage as Complete & Convert the Enquiry

1. Enter the client name and select from the Search results, as applicable

2. Fill in the mandatory (*) details under “Enquiry Details”; and Save

3. Mark Stage as Complete
